00022 #include "chipstream/QuantLabelZIO.h"
00023 #include "chipstream/SnpClusterStore.h"

00031 using namespace std;
00032 using namespace affx;
00033 
00034 SnpClusterStore::SnpClusterStore(const std::string &fileName, const std::string &tmpFileName) {
00035     if (SnpModelDb::isSqlModelFile(fileName)) {
00036         m_SnpDb.open(fileName);
00037     }
00038     else {
00039         if (tmpFileName.empty()) {
00040             TmpFileFactory tmpFac;
00041             m_TmpFile = tmpFac.genFilename_basic("SnpClusterStore", ".tmp");
00042         }
00043         else {
00044             m_TmpFile = tmpFileName;
00045         }
00046         Verbose::out(1, "Converting db to file: " + m_TmpFile);
00047         SnpModelConverter conv;
00048         conv.convertToDbModel(fileName, m_TmpFile);
00049         m_SnpDb.open(m_TmpFile);
00050     }
00051 }
00052 
00053 SnpClusterStore::~SnpClusterStore() {
00054     m_SnpDb.close();
00055     if (!m_TmpFile.empty()) {
00056         Fs::rm(m_TmpFile, false);
00057     }
00058 }
00059 
00060 bool SnpClusterStore::snpClusterExists(const std::string &snpName, int copyNumber) const {
00061     bool found = m_SnpDb.getSnpDistribution(snpName, copyNumber, m_DistCache);
00062     return found;
00063 }
00064 
00065 snp_distribution SnpClusterStore::getSnpCluster(const std::string &snpName, int copyNumber) const {
00066   bool found = false;
00067   string name = copyNumber == 1 ? snpName + ":1" : snpName;
00068   if (m_DistCache.probeset_id == name) {
00069       found = true;
00070       return m_DistCache.Dist;
00071   }
00072   else {
00073       found = m_SnpDb.getSnpDistribution(snpName, copyNumber, m_DistCache);
00074 
00075   }
00076   APT_ERR_ASSERT(found, "No model for: " + snpName + " copynumber: " + ToStr(copyNumber));
00077   return m_DistCache.Dist;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void SnpClusterStore::getHeaderValue(const std::string &key, std::vector<std::string> &values) const {
00081     m_SnpDb.getMetaValue(key, values);
00082 }
